# 2025 GENERAL SPORTS OFFER PRODUCT FACT FILE ![img-0.jpeg](img-0.jpeg) > The image depicts a rhythmic gymnast in mid-performance, showcasing a dynamic pose. The gymnast is wearing a sparkling, intricately designed costume that features a blend of pink and beige colors, adorned with shimmering sequins and embellishments. The outfit has a fitted bodice and a flared skirt, enhancing the elegance of the movement. > > Instead of a head, there is a large, shiny pink ball positioned where the head would typically be, creating a surreal and whimsical effect. The gymnast's arms are gracefully extended, one reaching out while the other is bent, emphasizing the fluidity and artistry of the routine. The background is a soft, neutral color, which helps to highlight the gymnast and the vibrant costume. Overall, the image captures a moment of grace and creativity in the sport of rhythmic gymnastics. ![img-1.jpeg](img-1.jpeg) > The image features a textual layout with a bold, large font displaying the year "2025" at the top. Below it, in a slightly smaller font, the words "GENERAL S" are visible, suggesting the beginning of a phrase or title. At the bottom, the text "PRODUCT FACT FIL" appears, indicating that it may be part of a product information document. The background is divided into two sections: a dark area behind the year and a lighter blue area below it. # 2025 SPORTS FEED SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS FEED SERVICE ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - A real-time sports news feed - Production available in 6 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic and Portuguese - Hourly coverage: 24/7, in real time - Non-regionalised feed | Description | Sports coverage | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more… | | Sports extras | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more… | ## *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-2.jpeg](img-2.jpeg) > The image presents a pie chart illustrating the distribution of stories published per day in various languages, totaling 292 stories (excluding updates). > > - The largest segment, colored blue, represents Arabic, accounting for 35% of the total. > - The second largest segment, in red, indicates English stories, making up 20%. > - The orange segment represents Spanish, contributing 14%. > - The purple section denotes French, which comprises 16%. > - The light blue segment shows German, accounting for 10%. > - Finally, the smallest segment, in yellow, represents Portuguese, making up 5%. > > The chart visually emphasizes the varying proportions of stories across these languages. | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | | Monthly subscription | Via satellite or FTP for direct integration into the customer's system API AFP News | | New | *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events | # 2025 ## SID SPORTS TEXT SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SID SPORTS TEXT Service ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Aimed at a German-speaking media, corporate and institutional clientele living mainly in Germany or in Europe and looking for rich coverage of sports news. - German correspondents present in Paris, Brussels, Washington, Istanbul. - Hourly coverage: 24/7 in real time. ## COVERAGE - Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, etc. - Sporting information managed by the SID office based in Cologne, aimed primarily at a German-speaking clientele looking for German sports news in real time. - Focus on German sports and the performance of German athletes. - The feed also covers other sports as well as the main national and special events ![img-3.jpeg](img-3.jpeg) ## COVERAGE DETAIL** - Athletics - Basketball - Cyclism - Handball - Motor sports - Ski - Football - Tennis - Olympics ## PRODUCT FORMATS - Delivery of metadata: XML, NewsML and jpg, if the story includes photos. ## SUBSCRIPTION - Monthly subscription to the complete feed or to a selection within the feed ## DELIVERY METHODS - FTP or satellite - AFP - Forum - SIDForum - API *Average volume from January to December 2024 **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events # 2025 ## SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC (ARB SPORT) PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC ## "ARB SPORT" EDITION ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Aimed at Arabic-speaking customers interested in world and regional sports news. - Validated by the Nicosia desk. - AFP has Arabic-speaking sports editors writing in Arabic, present in all countries of the region. - Hourly coverage: 6am to 10pm GMT, 7 days a week, in real time. ### COVERAGE - Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, motor racing sports, etc. - The feed also covers other sports as well as the main special, national and international (football World Cup, etc.) events. | Forecasts | Time (GMT) > The image is a pie chart displaying the distribution of various sports. The largest segment, colored blue, represents "Football," accounting for 57% of the total. Other segments include: > > - "Athletics" (light blue) at 6% > - "Basketball" (black) at 7% > - "Cycling" (gray) at 3% > - "Handball" (yellow) at 6% > - "Motor sports" (purple) at 6% > - "Ski" (light purple) at 6% > - "Tennis" (green) at 5% > - "Olympics" (orange) at 2% > > Each segment is labeled with its corresponding percentage, illustrating the relative popularity or participation in these sports. | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | "Sports forecast menu" | 11:30am | Forecasts on ARB Sport service themes: football, athletics, tennis, basketball. | ### Coverage details** ![img-4.jpeg](img-4.jpeg) | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | NewsML-G2, IIM, NewsML-1.1, ANPA | Monthly subscription to the full service or to the section. | API Satellite or FTP AFP News | **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events* # 2025 SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Pictures captioned in English and classified according to IPTC norms. - The number of pictures can reach 1,200 per day during weekends or for major special events. - Coverage: 24/7, in real-time ## Sports coverage Sports events Sports extras ## Description Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more... Sporting Institutions (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors) > The image presents a pie chart illustrating the distribution of daily reports related to various sports, with a total of over 30 reports per day (excluding updates). > > - The largest segment, colored blue, represents Football, accounting for 67% of the reports. > - The second largest segment, in orange, represents Motor Sports, making up 9%. > - The purple segment indicates Athletics at 2%. > - The light blue segment for Basketball comprises 8%. > - The red segment represents Tennis at 7%. > - Finally, the yellow segment for the Olympics also accounts for 7%. > > Each sport is clearly labeled with its corresponding color for easy identification. . Other themes relating to sport such as doping, justice, people, etc. ## Coverage details** ![img-5.jpeg](img-5.jpeg) PRODUCT FORMATS - Image size via satellite: 1.5 MB - Image size via FTP: - 1.5 MB - Formats via AFP Forum: 512 pixels, 768 pixels or original size - 800 KB for Africa SUBSCRIPTION - One-shot sales - Quota, with or without over quota - Photo feed (annual subscription) > The image presents a visual representation of the distribution of photos taken per day across various sports. The central pie chart is divided into segments, each representing a different sport, with percentages indicating the proportion of total photos attributed to each category. > > - The largest segment, colored in blue, represents Football, accounting for 39% of the total. > - Next is Athletics, shown in orange, making up 22%. > - Motor sports, in purple, comprises 11%. > - The remaining segments include Basketball (black, 7%), Cycling (red, 4%), Tennis (light blue, 3%), Rugby (green, 3%), Cricket (pink, 2%), and the Olympics (gray, 9%). > > To the left of the pie chart, the text indicates that a total of 1,490 photos are taken per day. ## DELIVERY METHODS - Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP - API - AFP News # 2025 INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SPORTS ## PRODUCT FACT FILE ![img-6.jpeg](img-6.jpeg) > The image features a simple design with a bright yellow background. In the foreground, the text "AFP" is displayed in bold blue letters, followed by a blue circle, and then the word "Sports" in black letters. The overall layout is clean and straightforward, emphasizing the "AFP" branding alongside the sports theme. # SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE ## SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Graphics combining information, images and data - Production available in 6 languages: French, English, Arabic, Spanish, German and Portuguese | Sports coverage | Description | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Systematic coverage of major Sports events: football World cup and Champions’ League, Olympic Summer and Winter Games, Tour de France, Formula One presentation On merit coverage of major sports development: record breaking, sport legends career summary… | | Sports extras | Explainer on new technologies and innovations in sports, on doping issues… | ### *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-7.jpeg](img-7.jpeg) | PRODUCT FORMATS | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS | | --- | --- | --- | | .AI .PNG (standard or retina) .JPEG (standard or retina) .PDF EPS .JPEG | One-shot sales Quota, with or without over-quota Infographics feed (annual subscription) > The image features a pie chart illustrating the distribution of infographics created per day in different languages. The chart is divided into five segments, each representing a language: > > - **German**: 24% (highlighted in yellow) > - **English**: 24% (highlighted in purple) > - **Spanish**: 21% (highlighted in light blue) > - **French**: 16% (highlighted in orange) > - **Portuguese**: 15% (highlighted in blue) > > To the left of the pie chart, there is a text indicating "6* Infographics per day," suggesting an average or target number of infographics produced daily. The overall design is clean and colorful, making it easy to compare the proportions of each language visually. Also available via Online News via FTP for direct integration | Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP API AFP News | **Average volume from January to December 2024* **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events like Olympics* # SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE ## SPORTS VIDEOGRAPHICS ### EDITORIAL FORMAT - Videographics combine text, images, video and 3D modelling elements with audio voice-over and a separate dopesheet - Formats dedicated to digital and audiovisual media: TV, online editors, mobiles, tablets, public screens… Available in 6 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, and Portuguese - Separate audio voice-over and script - Ready to publish format or editable format for translation and integration into your story. | Sports coverage | Description | | --- | --- | | Sports events | Systematic coverage of special events: Winter and Summer Olympic Games, FIFA World Cup | | Sports extras | Focus on new technologies and innovations in sports, including in Formula 1 | ### *Ratio per language for annual production in 2024** ![img-8.jpeg](img-8.jpeg) > The image features a pie chart illustrating the distribution of videographics produced per year, totaling 75. The chart is divided into five segments, each representing a different language: > > - **German**: A small segment colored light blue, accounting for 4% of the total. > - **English**: A segment in orange, representing 25%. > - **Spanish**: The largest segment, colored blue, making up 28%. > - **French**: A yellow segment, contributing 16%. > - **Portuguese**: A red segment, which comprises 27%. > > Above the pie chart, the text highlights the total number of videographics produced annually, emphasized in bold yellow font. ## PRODUCT FORMATS - JPEG - Adobe Flash [16:9] 640x360 (.f4v) - MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 1280x720 (.mp4) - MPEG4 H.264 [16:9] 640x360 (.mp4) - MPEG2 [4:3] 720x576 (.mp2) - One-shot sales - Quota, with or without over-quota - Videographics feed (annual subscription) - Also available via Online News via FTP for direct integration ## DELIVERY METHODS - Regionalised feeds available via satellite or FTP - API - AFP News **Average volume from January to December 2024** **Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events like Olympics** # 2025 SPORTS DATA FEED PRODUCT FACT FILE # SPORTS DATA FEED ## EDITORIAL FORMAT ## The largest catalogue of sports data More than 2,000 streams of sporting results covered per year Sporting data and performance statistics on the main matches and all competitions in real time Reliable, accurate and timely feeds, suitable for all types of media Available in 18 languages including French, English, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese and Portuguese Other languages available | Sports coverage | Description | | :-- | :-- | | Football | Domestic leagues, international cups, European
competitions | | Formula 1 | World championship | | Cycling | World championship | | Rugby | World Cup, Top 14, Pro D2, Champions Cup, 6 Nations | | Basketball | NBA, Euroleague, Europe Cup, EuroCup, World Cup | | Olympic Games | Summer and Winter Games | | Tennis | ATP / WTA, Billie Jean King Cup and Davis Cup | | Athletics | World Athletics meetings, World Championships, Diamond
League | | Volleyball | Women's and Men's European Volleyball Championships | PRODUCT FORMATS SUBSCRIPTION DELIVERY METHODS XML JSON One or several competitions / sports. One-off events (one-shot) Widgets Via API, for optimal integration Database-to-database replication # 2025 AFPTV SPORTS FR \& EN PRODUCT FACT FILE # AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Raw images with or without sound. - Fully edited video reports - Video length: from 30 seconds to 4 minutes / profiles and features : up to 10 minutes - Intended for broadcasters, production companies and other media - Product to be edited by the client ## COVERAGE - News and big competitions - Press conferences, training sessions, fan reactions, business, etc. - European football championships (Ligue 1, Liga, EPL), Champions League, Europa League (final) - Special events: Football World Cup, Olympic and Paralympic Games... - Red Bull Media House provides editorial content on a wide range of sporting disciplines from racing to esports and extreme sports in various locations around the world: 250 photos and 15 videos per month - Original reports and illustrative images | SLUG | Product | Edited sequences | Voice-over | Sound bite dubbing | Extra rushes | Script | Editable sequences | Sepxounds

ready-to-use articles ## EDITORIAL FORMAT - Automatic integration of articles into the client's site: - Integration of articles in real time in chronological order for easy and complete online access - Customised content integration to suit the client's content and upload preferences - Multiple editorial and technical formats for optimised adaptation to all digital media: web and mobile sites, public screens and any other interactive information medium and connected TV. ## ADDED VALUE - Productivity gains for media departments for non-core topics, thanks to instant publication of content and continuous feed to web and mobile sites - Sections adapted to suit each production language - Unique metadata to index and reference each news story ## AVAILABLE I ANGUAGES - Service available in 9 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, simplified and traditional Chinese. 108 *Articles illustrated per day (all languages) > The image features a series of text boxes on a black background, each highlighting key features of a video production service. > > 1. The first box states "Coverage" followed by "24 hours a day" and "7 days a week," indicating continuous availability. > 2. The second box mentions "+ 300* editable videos per month," suggesting a high volume of video content that can be customized. > 3. The third box lists "130 video production points worldwide," emphasizing a global reach and extensive network for video production services. > > The text is presented in a clean, modern font, enhancing readability against the dark background. | Languages | Number of sections | | --- | --- | | French | 3 | | English | 5 | | Spanish | 6 | | German | 19 | | Portuguese | 2 | | Arabic | 1 | | Chinese | 1 | ## PRODUCT FORMATS - Text: NewsML 1.2, XML, HTML, NewsML G2 formats - Photos: rectangular formats 768px, 245px, 110px square formats 220px, 170px, 120px - Videos: Mpeg4 H.264, Flash, MP2 PAL ## SUBSCRIPTION - To the section - Feed ## DELIVERY METHODS - FTP - API - AFP Forum # AFP SPORTS STORIES ## IN FRENCH ### COVERAGE - 3 thematic sections providing comprehensive coverage of international news. ![img-10.jpeg](img-10.jpeg) ### SECTIONS | AFP Stories Sections in French | Topic Daily average | Updated Daily average | Illustrations per article (photos & infographics) Daily average | Number of articles with video Daily average | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Football* | 4 | 10 | 1 | 1 | | Sports* | 13 | 19 | 2 | 1 | | Olympic Games* | 1 | 1 | 2 | 1 | | Total (average) > The image features a sleek, modern design with a black background.
